name: A Flaming Halo
data: It decreases the users strength a tiny bit.
It decreases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration adequately.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
The flaming halo grants spellcasters special properties.
The flaming halo is a holy artifact of the goddess Kirvana.
